creditline: Gift of funds from Marla J. Kinney
description: stone bridge with three arches, with a channel of water bisecting at C; swans floating in water in LRQ; geese walking in a line on the bank in LRC; horse and carriage drive over bridge on R side; trees in center; figure bending over on the bank of the water in C L; houses and trees in ULQ
provenance: [Hilary Chapman Fine Prints, Richmond, Surrey, England, until 2007; sold to Rossetti]; John Rossetti, Somerville, Mass. (2007–2021); [William P. Carl, Durham, N.C., 2021]
title: The Bridge, Burghfield
